Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 3 Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika » 3.1 Sappaccayaduka, Kusalattika » 3.1.2 Abyākatapada » 3.1.2.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
Cūḷantaraduka, Kusalattika
Sappaccayaduka, Kusalattika
Abyākatapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccanīyuddhāra
12.
1491Sappaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  sahajātapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
1492Appaccayo abyākato dhammo sappaccayassa abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
13.
1493Nahetuyā dve, naārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1494Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe ekaṃ. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1495Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe dve. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
1496Sappaccayadukakusalattikaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
